name: Country Discoverer
description:
Country Discoverer is a fast-paced, arcade twin-stick shooter with a high-skill scoring system and robust online leaderboards. Test your reflexes and your intellect as you sail the seas discovering new countries by launching giant telescopes at them as they hurtle towards you. Don't worry about it - it's weird.



Your knowledge of our world will be tested as you dodge and dash through a tumultuous sea. Collect powerups, build your multiplier, and go for the ultimate high score!

Do you have what it takes to become the world's top Country Discoverer?



Your ship is waiting, captain.



10% of all profits from Country Discoverer will be donated to the Urban Native Youth Association: https://unya.bc.ca
